title: Torch God's Favor
info: Torch God's Favor is a consumable item obtained by surviving The Torch God event. Upon use, it permanently grants the player the ability to automatically convert regular torches in the player's hand to the current biome's torch variant, which positively influences the player's Torch Luck in most areas.
stat:
Type
Consumable
Use time30 (Average)
TooltipUnlocks an ability toggle to the left of the inventory
When enabled normal torches change according to your biome
Rarity04*
Sell2
Research1 required
